import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df.plot.scatter(x='Sleep Duration', y='Quality of Sleep')
plt.title('Relationship between Sleep Duration and Quality of Sleep')
plt.xlabel('Sleep Duration')
plt.ylabel('Quality of Sleep')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df.groupby('Occupation')['Sleep Duration'].mean().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Average Sleep Duration Across Different Occupations')
plt.xlabel('Occupation')
plt.ylabel('Average Sleep Duration (hours)')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df['Stress Level'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Distribution of Stress Levels Among All Individuals')
plt.xlabel('Stress Level')
plt.ylabel('Count')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df['Gender'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Gender Distribution')
plt.xlabel('Gender')
plt.ylabel('Count')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df.groupby('Sleep Disorder')['Daily Steps'].mean().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Average Daily Steps by Sleep Disorder')
plt.xlabel('Sleep Disorder')
plt.ylabel('Average Daily Steps')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df['Physical Activity Level'] = df['Physical Activity Level'].astype(float)
df['Quality of Sleep'] = df['Quality of Sleep'].astype(int)

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.scatter(df['Physical Activity Level'], df['Quality of Sleep'])
plt.title('Relationship between Physical Activity and Quality of Sleep')
plt.xlabel('Physical Activity Level')
plt.ylabel('Quality of Sleep')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df_grouped = df.groupby('Sleep Disorder')['Physical Activity Level'].mean().reset_index()

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.bar(df_grouped['Sleep Disorder'], df_grouped['Physical Activity Level'])
plt.xlabel('Sleep Disorder')
plt.ylabel('Average Physical Activity Level')
plt.title('Comparison of Average Physical Activity Levels with and without Sleep Disorders')

plt.show()
